Package wellen

Class Note

  • java.lang.Object
    • wellen.Note
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MIDI
    public abstract class Note
extends java.lang.Object
implements MIDI
    supplies a series of note constants and methods to convert note values to frequencies and vice versa.
